article.author: Princess
article.title: Explore the world together with Princess Cruises and an exclusive offer from your Travel Advisor.
article.lead: No matter where you sail or in what stateroom, you can get all this included plus up to $85 onboard credit per stateroom on select voyages and $100 per person cruisetour cash on select cruisetours in Alaska compliments of your Travel Advisor.
article.body:
• Premier Beverage Package with tips: Enjoy everything from cocktails, beer and wine to specialty coffees, smoothies and bottled water.
  • Unlimited Wi-Fi: Video chat and text with family back home, stream your favorite shows and check email (but only if you want to).
  • Full gratuities paid to our crew on your behalf: Don’t worry – we make sure the crew who takes care of you is taken care of too.
